department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: elephant-headed figure with four arms seated on a hexagonal throne; standing women at L and R; woman at L holds a plate and a jug; backing on top, R and L sides
markings: LLC, on back, stamped in purple: [Kapoor Curios./ No 9/ 17/ Price/ Jullundur City.]
medium: Ink, red ochri and pencil on paper
title: Ganesha with Attendants
